name: Production Incident Report - API Gateway Outage
content:
Incident Report: API Gateway Outage

Incident Details:

  • Date: March 14, 2024

  • Duration: 45 minutes (14:30-15:15 UTC)

  • Severity: P1 (Critical)

  • Impact: 100% API Gateway downtime

Timeline:

  1. 14:30 UTC - Initial alert triggered

    • High latency detected

    • Error rate spike observed

  2. 14:35 UTC - Investigation started

    • SRE team engaged

    • Initial diagnostics run

  3. 14:45 UTC - Root cause identified

    • Memory leak in rate limiter

    • Resource exhaustion confirmed

Resolution:

  • Gateway pods restarted

  • Rate limiter configuration updated

  • Memory limits adjusted

Follow-up Actions:

  1. Implement memory monitoring

  2. Review rate limiter logic

  3. Update runbook documentation

Lessons Learned:

  • Need better memory tracking

  • Alert thresholds too high

  • Documentation gaps identified
